Shell Scripts.quote: #!/bin/bash - Command line interpreters: Bash, sh, csh, zsh for system automation.

Python Scripts.quote: #!/usr/bin/env python3 - General-purpose scripting: readable, extensive libraries.

JavaScript Scripts.quote: <script> - Web browser scripting: DOM manipulation, client-side functionality.

Perl Scripts.quote: #!/usr/bin/perl - Text processing: Regular expressions, system administration.

Ruby Scripts.quote: #!/usr/bin/ruby - Object-oriented scripting: Rails framework, elegant syntax.

PHP Scripts.quote: <?php ?> - Server-side web scripting: HTML embedding, database integration.

PowerShell Scripts.quote: .ps1 - Windows automation: System administration, .NET framework access.

VBScript.quote: Windows scripting: COM automation, legacy Windows administration.

AutoHotkey Scripts.quote: Automation scripting: Keyboard shortcuts, GUI automation on Windows.

AppleScript.quote: Mac OS automation: System control, application interaction.

Lua Scripts.quote: Embedded scripting: Game development, configuration, lightweight.

TCL Scripts.quote: Tool Command Language: GUI development, testing, embedded systems.

R Scripts.quote: Statistical computing: Data analysis, visualization scripting.

MATLAB Scripts.quote: .m files - Numerical computing: Scientific calculations, matrix operations.

Groovy Scripts.quote: JVM scripting: Java integration, build automation with Gradle.

Batch Scripts.quote: .bat/.cmd - Windows command scripts: Simple automation, legacy support.

Awk Scripts.quote: Text processing: Pattern scanning, report generation.

Sed Scripts.quote: Stream editor: Text transformation, file processing.

TypeScript Scripts.quote: Typed JavaScript: Enhanced IDE support, large-scale applications.

Google Apps Scripts.quote: Google Workspace automation: Spreadsheets, Docs, Calendar integration.

Unity Scripts.quote: C# scripts for Unity: Game logic, behavior implementation.

Ansible Scripts.quote: YAML-based automation: Infrastructure as code, deployment.

Jenkins Scripts.quote: Pipeline scripts: CI/CD automation, build processes.

SQL Scripts.quote: Database operations: Data manipulation, stored procedures.

Task Runners.quote: Grunt, Gulp: Build automation, development workflow.
